price: Ìyẹn ni ohun tí wọ́n wọ̀n nínú ìmọ̀. Dájúdájú Olúwa rẹ lÓ nímọ̀ jùlọ nípa ẹni tó ṣìnà kúrò lójú ọ̀nà Rẹ̀. Ó sì nímọ̀ jùlọ nípa ẹni tó mọ̀nà.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ مَبۡلَغُهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡعِلۡمِۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَنِ ٱهۡتَدَىٰ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: dhālika mablaghuhum mina al-ʿil'mi inna rabbaka huwa aʿlamu biman ḍalla ʿan sabīlihi wahuwa aʿlamu bimani ih'tadā
